EmailTemplate.subject: Special Invitation for The Ffreedom Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Registration__c.Name}}
On behalf of Ffreedom Financial Planners I would like to take this opportunity to invite you for The Ffreedom Day to be held on Sunday the 22nd of August 2010 at the Hotel Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach.
The Ffreedom Day is a conference where we believe passionately in the power of sharing ideas, experiences and knowledge to change attitudes and lives. So we're building here a powerhouse that offers knowledge and inspiration from some of the most passionate, driven and inspired thinkers, and also a community of curious souls to engage with ideas and each other.
To Know More About The Speakers & The Topics, please visit www.ffreedomday.in/EventSpeakers?Id={!Registration__c.Id}
The conference will feature "Ffreedom Talks" by speakers from various fields and expertise who will come together to share their ideas, experiences and knowledge revolving around the theme of Happiness, Dreams and Financial Freedom.
To Check The Event Program Schedule, please visit www.ffreedomday.in/EventItinerary?Id={!Registration__c.Id}
The Ffreedom Day is conceived & hosted by Ffreedom Financial Planners a financial planning firm which believes that financial ffreedom stands for people, their dreams & their goals.
Kindly Click on the link below www.ffreedomday.in/EventRegistration?Id={!Registration__c.Id} To RSVP/ Confirm Your Attendance For The Event
Help Desk: For any & all assistance you can email us at contact@ffreedom.in or call us at 022 4222 4333.
To know more about the event & Ffreedom Financial Planners kindly visit www.ffreedomday.in or www.ffreedom.in
Looking forward to meeting you at the Ffreedom Day.
Thank you on behalf of the team at Ffreedom Financial Planners.
Sincerely,
Sumeet Vaid Founder & CEO Ffreedom Financial Planners
